sign_up_error_description: Something went wrong. Please try again.
sign_up_success_description: Check your inbox and verify your email to get started.
forgot_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password_success: Password reset link sent to your email.
set_password_description: Please set a password to secure your account.
set_password_success_description: You can now log in with your email and password.
set_password_error_description: Something went wrong. Please try again.
no_token_description: Please check the link in your email.
profile_onboarding_description: This information will be used to personalize your experience.
profile_onboarding_success_description: You can now start using CollabTube.
profile_image_size: Files up to 2MB at least 400px by 400px
organization_onboarding_description: This information will be used to create your organization.
personal_details_description: Set your name and contact information, the email address entered here is used for your login access.
change_email_instruction: We will send a change request to your new email address. After clicking on the link in the email, you will be automatically logged out and and will need to login in again with your new email address.
change_password_description: To make an update, enter your existing password followed by a new one. If you don't know your existing password, logout and use the forgot password link.
password_strength_error: Password too weak. Please use a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters.
revoke_other_sessions_description: This will log you out of all other devices. You will remain logged in on this device.
delete_account_description: Be careful, an account deletion cannot be undone.
delete_account_card_description: The account will be permanently deleted, including its organizations and data. This action is irreversible and can not be undone..
delete_account_instruction_description: By proceeding to deleting this User, you're permanently removing your data from the system.
manage_sessions_description: Sign out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
member_organizations_description: Organizations you are a member of
not_a_member_of_any_organization: You're not a member of any organization
